projects.name: New Gadget
projects.description: I have a new gadget, help me make it a product you can buy!
projects.intentions: I will take this money and make a doo-dad
projects.rewards: If you fund $20 you get a t-shirt with the gadget on it. If you fund $40 you get the gadget.

contributions.comment: This is great, I totally needed a new gadget, it sounds like someone is finally listening!

projects.name: BigClown
projects.description: the best IoT kit in the galaxy. BigClown will help you to build your own electronics. The kit modular, wireless, open-source, running on batteries for years and with support
projects.intentions: Start creating your smart gadgets. It is as simple as building a castle from LEGO® bricks or an IKEA® cabinet
projects.rewards: If you fund $100 you get a BigCown 50%

contributions.comment: Finally! An IoT kit for my skill level!
I can't wait for my BigClown!

projects.name: Evo-X Chair
projects.description: Evo-X Chair is designed to correct bad posture while eliminating back issues
projects.intentions: I will use this money to produce more of them
projects.rewards: If you fund a $200 you get 25% of Evo-X-Chair
